about_the_game:
Dive into the thrilling world of cryptocurrencies and blockchain with Money Block, an immersive economic strategy game where you manage a virtual cryptocurrency portfolio. Buy, sell, and mine blocks while navigating an unpredictable and ruthless market. Will you master the blockchain and maximize your profits, or fall victim to the volatility of cryptos?

Key Features:

  • Dynamic Market Simulation: Every turn is influenced by random events, price fluctuations, and the actions of other players. Survive bull and bear market cycles while adapting to changing trends.

  • Portfolio Management: Manage up to 6 different cryptocurrencies. Make strategic purchases, sell at the right moment, and diversify your assets to maximize your portfolio’s value.

  • Mining System: Allocate your CPU and energy resources to validate blocks, accumulate rewards, and actively participate in blockchain building.

  • Action and Market Cards: Play cards that can influence market prices, attack your opponents, or protect your investments. Automatically drawn Market cards impact the overall economy, while player Action cards target specific cryptocurrencies.

  • Multiplayer Strategy: Play with 2 to 6 players online, using bluff, cunning, and strategy to outsmart your opponents. Every decision influences the market and affects other players' strategies.

  • A Constantly Evolving World: Face global events that simulate the real-life highs and lows of the cryptocurrency world. Adapt to hacks, regulations, bull runs, and other economic surprises.

Money Block immerses you in a captivating experience where every transaction, every validated block, and every decision matters. Join a world where digital finance is at your fingertips and dominate the blockchain.
